title: The Prince's Convenient Bride
description: The passionate prince—When Prince Marco Considine sees model Jacoba Sinclair, he wants her—The supercool supermodel—But Jacoba can never surrender to Marco. She fears he'll discover her secret—And a reason for a convenient marriage! When Jacoba's secret is uncovered, Marco seizes his opportunity. By announcing their engagement he can offer her royal protection—and royal passion!
author: Robyn Donald
